show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Lower blood pressure readings may not be better in treating high blood pressure and may be dangerous! What is more important in a blood pressure reading, the top or bottom number and what are the dangers of each?
Why the most common blood pressure medication doctors prescribe can be shockingly dangerous to your health?
How our GI tract can protect against getting diabetes and obesity.
How can watching TV kill you?
Vickiâ€™s 20-20 tips are: Yogurts that are worse for your health than doughnuts!
Some of the amazing health benefits of pumpkin seeds.
